member.name: M:AccWebCrawler.CommonMethods.ResolveAvailableUpdatesResult(System.String,System.String,System.Text.Encoding,System.Text.Encoding,AccWebCrawler.CommonMethods.ConvertStringToDateDelegate,System.Net.DownloadDataCompletedEventArgs,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Evaluates data fetched by CheckForAvailableUpdatesAsync method, compares fetched remote date with the local file date and returns remote date.
member.param: Url of a remote text file containing available update date.
Path to local text file containing the last installed update date.
If date string format is NOT YYYY-MM-DD, function for conversion should be provided. Else set to nothing.
DownloadDataCompletedEventArgs object returned by WebClient and containing info about remote text file with the available update date.
member.returns: Available update date if it is later then last installed update date. Else returns Date.MinValue
